statements: SELECT * FROM sustainability_practices;
SELECT brand_name, product_name, production_method FROM sustainability_practices WHERE ethical_sourcing = TRUE;
SELECT id, brand_name, product_name FROM sustainability_practices ORDER BY brand_name DESC;
SELECT brand_name, product_name, material_used FROM sustainability_practices WHERE production_method = 'Organic';
SELECT id, brand_name, ethical_sourcing FROM sustainability_practices WHERE material_used = 'Recycled' OR material_used = 'Biodegradable';
SELECT brand_name, product_name, production_method FROM sustainability_practices WHERE material_used='recycled' ORDER BY brand_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_practices WHERE ethical_sourcing=true AND material_used='organic' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT brand_name FROM sustainability_practices WHERE production_method='handmade' ORDER BY brand_name ASC;
SELECT brand_name, product_name FROM sustainability_practices WHERE material_used='bamboo' OR material_used='cotton' ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products, AVG(id) AS avg_id FROM sustainability_practices GROUP BY production_method HAVING AVG(id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_practices;
SELECT brand_name, product_name, ethical_rating FROM sustainability_practices ORDER BY ethical_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM sourcing_methods WHERE source_location='China';
SELECT brand_name, certifications FROM sourcing_methods WHERE material_type='Cotton' AND certifications='GOTS Certified';
SELECT brand_name, product_name, sustainability_rating FROM sustainability_practices ORDER BY sustainability_rating DESC;
SELECT brand_name, product_name, sustainability_rating FROM sustainability_practices WHERE ethical_rating > 3 ORDER BY sustainability_rating DESC;
SELECT brand_name, product_name, sustainability_rating FROM sustainability_practices WHERE production_method = 'Organic' ORDER BY brand_name ASC, product_name ASC;
SELECT brand_name, material_type, source_location, certifications FROM sourcing_methods WHERE material_type = 'Cotton' ORDER BY source_location DESC;
SELECT brand_name, product_name, sustainability_rating FROM sustainability_practices WHERE sustainability_rating > 4 AND ethical_rating > 3 ORDER BY brand_name ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT brand_name, product_name, production_method FROM sustainability_practices WHERE production_method != 'Conventional' ORDER BY brand_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_practices ORDER BY brand_name ASC;
SELECT brand_name, fair_trade FROM sustainability_practices WHERE eco_friendly = true;
SELECT brand_name, certification FROM ethical_sourcing WHERE certification = 'Fair Trade';
SELECT * FROM production_methods WHERE sustainable_materials = true ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT brand_name, eco_friendly FROM sustainability_practices WHERE fair_trade = true;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_practices WHERE eco_friendly = TRUE;
SELECT brand_name, fair_trade FROM sustainability_practices WHERE id = 1;
SELECT brand_name, certification FROM ethical_sourcing WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Supplier';
SELECT brand_name, sustainable_materials FROM production_methods WHERE brand_name = 'XYZ Brand' AND energy_efficient = TRUE;
SELECT brand_name, fair_trade, certification FROM sustainability_practices JOIN ethical_sourcing ON sustainability_practices.brand_name = ethical_sourcing.brand_name;
SELECT id, company_name, sustainability_rating, certification_status FROM sustainability_practices;
SELECT * FROM ethical_sourcing WHERE ethical_rating > 3;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, ethical_rating FROM ethical_sourcing WHERE ethical_rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT company_name, transparency_rating FROM transparency WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT id, method_name, labor_conditions_rating FROM production_methods ORDER BY labor_conditions_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_practices ORDER BY company_name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT company_name, sustainability_rating FROM sustainability_practices WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM ethical_sourcing WHERE ethical_rating > 3 AND supplier_name = 'ABC Supplies';
SELECT company_name, transparency_rating FROM transparency WHERE transparency_rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY transparency_rating ASC;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, ethical_rating FROM ethical_sourcing WHERE supplier_name != 'XYZ Suppliers' ORDER BY ethical_rating DESC;
SELECT brand_name, sustainability_rating FROM Sustainability_Practices;
SELECT manufacturer_name, certification, country_of_origin FROM Ethical_Sourcing WHERE certification = 'Fair Trade';
SELECT * FROM Production_Methods ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM Fashion_Items WHERE size = 'M' AND color = 'Blue';
SELECT customer_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM Sales_Data WHERE sale_amount > 100 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sustainability_Practices ORDER BY sustainability_rating DESC, brand_name;
SELECT brand_name, practices FROM Sustainability_Practices WHERE sustainability_rating > 3 AND brand_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY brand_name ASC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, country_of_origin, certification FROM Ethical_Sourcing WHERE country_of_origin = 'USA' OR certification IS NOT NULL ORDER BY manufacturer_name;
SELECT method_name, efficiency_rating, environmental_impact FROM Production_Methods WHERE efficiency_rating >= 5 ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC;
SELECT item_name, price, size, color FROM Fashion_Items WHERE price < 100.00 ORDER BY item_name ASC, price DESC;
